name: Crazy Monster Truck Drive
description:
Your goal in Crazy monster truck drive is you have to drive your big vehicle on tracks with full speed, perform mad stunts and reach the finish line within the time limit. Race on the jump filled tracks to and show that you are the best professional racing stunt driver. Best thing about this game is you do not have to just drive the monster truck with speed limitations but stop at different points or destinations in your way. Caution! You have to complete your mission in the given time unless you will be failed and can't start your next mission. Complete multiple super exciting levels on top of city and skyline tracks. In each mission reach the finish points on impossible tracks with ultimate stunts as fast as you can.

Ultra HD graphics, 3D space environment and cool animations will make the game best. Interesting and challenging missions, intuitive controls and perfect sound will keep you in game for hours. This simulation does not contain any kind of violence. Crazy monster truck drive does not require any internet connection to play the game. Download this wonderful game from the app store.

How to Play
• Start the Game
• Tilt to move left/right
• Press break button to slow down
• Touch camera button to change view
• Press nitro to boost your dashing monster
Features:
• Very smooth and realistic control
• Stunning 3d HD Graphics
• Beautiful Space environment
• Real sound effects
• Wonderful tracks for driving.
